sentence: Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, who has now been censured by state party officials and the Republican National Committee, is running for reelection against Trump pick Harriet Hageman.
author: Warren Rojas
title: Trump is on an endorsement spree and has now put his MAGA stamp on more than 100 political candidates since leaving the White House

sentence: As Vanity Fair reported last month, Thiel hosted a January fundraiser at his Miami compound for Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, the Trumpbacked candidate running a primary challenge against Liz Cheney after Cheney refused to endorse Trump's big lie? and voted to impeach him.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Peter Thiel Is MAGA's Big Money Man

sentence: Her main challenger in this race, Harriet Hageman, went in the opposite direction: from fervent Never Trumper in 2016 to a fervent Trumper today.
title: It's Never a Good Time for the Hunter Biden Story

sentence: McCarthy has thrown his political weight behind Harriet Hageman, a Trump-backed congressional candidate who is challenging Cheney in Wyoming -- an endorsement that earned him plaudits on the right, a key constituency in a potential future bid for the speaker's gavel.
author: Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy calls endorsement of Cheney's primary foe a 'special case'
